children.value: Governance and risk meetings take place

at 4:00 PM UTC.
You are welcome to join!
Public meetings are now password-protected to prevent spam. The weekly password is on the
These meetings set the stage for cultural and operational consensus across the community for a broad range of stakeholders and issues related to these
Governance Facilitators host the calls and put together the agenda each week. Below are typical inclusions:
Comments and Questions are encouraged throughout the calls
Open-ended discussion sessions at the end of some calls
Notes are a primary  way to document discussions and decisions. They make the content more accessible to the people who can't make the meetings or don't have time to watch the full recordings.
<Link to="/contribute/governance_and_risk_meetings/take-notes/">Join our Summary Team, and we’ll pay you!</Link>
<Link to="https://community-development.makerdao.com/"> **Frequent Topics** See what's discussed in meetings </Link>
We’ve created lots of content to help better understand governance and show you ways to get involved.
See where the voting happens and take a look at the current votes.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us on

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Governance and Risk Meetings","order":1,"hideLanguageSelector":true,"keywords":"governance, risk, meetings, community, MakerDAO","description":"Weekly meetings allow a chance to participate in the community and help shape the future of Maker."}
